name: 克里斯蒂安妮·菲朗吉里
name_full: 克里斯蒂安妮·菲朗吉里 Christiane Filangieri
birth_place: 德国,巴伐利亚,维尔茨堡
introduction: Of noble family (Filangieri), born in Germany, her father Antonio (1924-2002) was an explorer and philanthropist who has collected in the family mansion in San Potito Sannitico, different objects of the Indians of the Amazon and Mato Grosso, He was also an able defender of the constitution of the national Park of Matese. Her mother Elisabeth Felkel is Bohemian born in Prague in 1938, had to leave town with his family during the Second World War, was a popular painter of Russian icons. She has a sister Yvonne Carolina [2] long-lived as a child in Brazil. She worked briefly as a tour leader and then as a model.Her acting career began after participating in the competition for Miss Italy 1997, where it ranks third. In 1998 a program leading fashion issuer Stream cable TV.In 1999 she made her debut in cinema with the film do not know yet, in which she plays the role of the Navy and, in the same year, is the testimonial of the phone company TIM, as well as appearing on the advertising material in different spots linked by a sort of history in evolution.Later starred in several TV dramas, including The team (2000), A woman friend 3 (2001), directed by Alberto Manni and Marcantonio Graffeo, but the goalkeeper is never?, We're good together, and Perlasca. An Italian hero, directed by Alberto Negrin, Luca Zingaretti, in 2002, Lovers and secrets (2004) and Lovers and secrets 2 (2005), directed by John Hare, in which she plays the role of Marta Castelli.In 2006, plays its colors Lorenza Petrai Youth, directed by Gianluigi Calderone, starring in 2007's TV series broadcasted on Rai Uno, We were only one thousand, directed by Stefano Reali, in which she plays the role of Isabella.The same year he runs the series I Married a Cop, directed by Elia Carmine, in which he stars with Flavio Insinna, with the participation of Giovanna Ralli, Barbara Bouchet and Luisa Corna. In autumn 2008, is among the protagonists of the series crimes whites. In 2010, the series runs again I married a cop 2. In 2011 Prof. Francesca plays the role of high school in The Road 3, together with Massimo Poggio and Guarino, Josephine in 2012 than in The General of the robbers.
